name: panda
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large, black and white mammal that lives in forests in China. Pandas eat bamboo.
Keren Su/ China Span/GettyImages

Add to word list
a large black-and-white mammal, similar to a bear, that lives in forests in China and eats bamboo (= stems of a type of grass)
